traits.name: Aura: Entangle
traits.detail: The ground in a 10 ft radius around you is difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 14 STR save or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: (Defender) Heavy Defence
traits.detail: Your defence is impenetrable. Gain +2 AC.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The dragon attacks once with its claws and once with its tail.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 1d6+4 slashing damage, plus 1d6 cold damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 1d8 slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 2d6+2 piercing damage, plus 2d6 cold damage.

actions.name: Wing Attack
actions.detail: Each creature within 10' of the dragon must make a DC 14 CON save or be pushed back 10' and knocked prone.

actions.name: Icy Tomb (1/day)
actions.detail: The dragon blasts an enemy with ice, trying to freeze it over. The target must make a DC 17 STR save or take 2d10 cold damage and become restrained until it or another creature makes a DC 17 STR check as an action to break it free. Until the creature is freed, it takes 15 ongoing cold damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not restrained.
